EntryName	PLPHP_HUMAN
ProteinName	Pyridoxal phosphate homeostasis protein (PLP homeostasis protein) (Proline synthase co-transcribed bacterial homolog protein) (Pyridoxal phosphate-binding protein)
GeneName	PLPBP PROSC
Length	275
Function	Pyridoxal 5'-phosphate (PLP)-binding protein, which may be involved in intracellular homeostatic regulation of pyridoxal 5'-phosphate (PLP), the active form of vitamin B6.
